pkgmetadata.longdescription: Closed Testing Procedure (CTP) // This is a package for constructing hypothesis trees for treatment comparisons based on the closure principle and analysing the corresponding Closed Testing Procedures (CTP) using adjusted p-values. For reference, see Marcus, R., Peritz, E, and Gabriel, K.R. (1976) doi:10.2307/2335748 and Bauer, P (1991) doi:10.1002/sim.4780100609.
